title: The 10 Best Eye Creams for a Cold-Weather Fix
text:
Photo: Courtesy of diskincare.com See more photos of: 
When the temperatures dip and skin starts to wither, the eyes are always the first to show it. Fortunately, a host of new high-tech, targeted formulas are specifically designed to defend delicate area against winter’s harsh climate. And the wide-awake glow they impart—whether or not you’ve had a good night’s sleep—is reason enough to indulge. 
Among the most exciting new offerings this season is Malin+Goetz’s revitalizing eye cream, formulated with marine algae and hardworking peptides to lock in moisture and to reduce inflammation and puffiness. Another soon to be cold-weather favorite is Dermalogica’s age-reversal eye complex created with micro encapsulated retinol to help dissolve fine lines, while Lancôme’s new correcting balm contains HydraBlur technology to smooth imperfections on contact, doubling as a powerful makeup primer. 
For banishing dark circles, and moisturizing, BeautyRX by Dr. Schultz’s hydrating solution contains a unique formula of hyaluronic, glycolic, and lactic acids, as well as a brightening compound that’s designed to reduce spot-inducing melanin and fight dullness. Here are 10 of the best eye creams to stock up on now—and reapply all winter long.
